cooldown.title: Out of service!
cooldown.description:
I might've ran out of batteries or slipped over a banana peel.
Let me recharge for **~{wait}** and then try again.

unknown_exception.title: Out of service!
unknown_exception.description:
I might've hit a brick wall or something isn't computing properly.
Could you try this again?

If it happens again, I might need to call in the manager...

setup.upgrade_footer: Need more? Consider upgrading to another plan.
setup.success_title: You're set up and ready to go!
setup.success_description: The wicked machinery has been enabled for this Community.
setup.already_enabled_description:
The wicked machinery has already been enabled for this Community.
You don't have to do anything else.
